markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Practiced Reloads](/Feats.aspx?ID=3219) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 127</row>

**Archetype** [Gunslinger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=114)

**Prerequisites**
[Gunslinger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3215)

</column>

---

You've mastered the reloading techniques and methods usually practiced by only the most dedicated firearm professionals. You gain the slinger's reload for the [way](/classes/gunslinger/ways) you selected with Gunslinger's Dedication.
name: Practiced Reloads
